00016 #include "TTEInput.h"
00017 
00018 #include <configuration/ConfigurationUtils.h>

00020 #include <iostream>
00021 
00022 using namespace TTEthernetModel;
00023 
00024 Define_Module( TTEInput);
00025 
00026 simsignal_t TTEInput::ctDroppedSignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00027 
00028 void TTEInput::initialize()
00029 {
00030     ConfigurationUtils::getPreloadedMMR();
00031     ecorecpp::ModelRepository_ptr mr = ecorecpp::ModelRepository::_instance();
00032     ConfigurationUtils::resolveCommonAliases(mr);
00033     ::ecore::EObject_ptr eobj = mr->getByFilename(getParentModule()->getParentModule()->par("network_configuration"));
00034     assert(eobj);
00035     NetworkConfig *nc = ::ecore::instanceOf<NetworkConfig>(eobj);
00036     assert(nc);
00037 
00038     DeviceSpecification *ds = ConfigurationUtils::getDeviceSpecification(
00039             getParentModule()->getParentModule()->par("device_name"), nc);
00040     assert(ds);
00041 
00042     if (ds->eClass()->getName() == "Switch")
00043     {
00044         Switch *sw = ds->as<Switch> ();
00045         if (sw->getConfig())
00046         {
00047             ct_marker = ConfigurationUtils::mac2long(sw->getConfig()->getCtMarker());
00048             ct_mask = ConfigurationUtils::mac2long(sw->getConfig()->getCtMask());
00049         }
00050     }
00051     else if (ds->eClass()->getName() == "EndSystem")
00052     {
00053         EndSystem *es = ds->as<EndSystem> ();
00054         if (es->getConfig())
00055         {
00056             ct_marker = ConfigurationUtils::mac2long(es->getConfig()->getCtMarker());
00057             ct_mask = ConfigurationUtils::mac2long(es->getConfig()->getCtMask());
00058         }
00059     }
00060 
00061     ctDroppedSignal = registerSignal("ctDropped");
00062 }
00063 
00064 void TTEInput::addIncoming(uint16 ctID, Incoming *incoming)
00065 {
00066     incomings[ctID].push_back(incoming);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void TTEInput::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00070 {
00071     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00072     {
00073         EtherFrame *frame = (EtherFrame*) msg;
00074         //Auf CTCs verteilen oder BE traffic
00075         if (isCT(frame))
00076         {
00077             std::map<uint16, std::list<Incoming *> >::iterator incomingList = incomings.find(getCTID(frame));
00078             if (incomingList != incomings.end())
00079             {
00080                 //Send to all CTCs for the CT-ID
00081                 for (std::list<Incoming*>::iterator incoming = incomingList->second.begin(); incoming
00082                         != incomingList->second.end(); incoming++)
00083                 {
00084                     sendDirect(frame->dup(), (*incoming)->gate("in"));
00085                 }
00086                 delete frame;
00087             }
00088             else
00089             {
00090                 ev << "No incoming traffic allowed for CT ID " << getCTID(frame) << endl;
00091                 bubble("Frame not allowed here!");
00092                 emit(ctDroppedSignal, 1);
00093                 delete frame;
00094             }
00095         }
00096         //Sonst BE
00097         else
00098         {
00099             send(msg, "out");
00100         }
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool TTEInput::isCT(EtherFrame *frame)
00105 {
00106     unsigned char macBytes[6];
00107     frame->getDest().getAddressBytes(macBytes);
00108     //Check for ct
00109     if ((((macBytes[0] << 24) | (macBytes[1] << 16) | (macBytes[2] << 8) | (macBytes[3])) & ct_mask) == (ct_marker
00110             & ct_mask))
00111     {
00112         return true;
00113     }
00114     //TODO More checking ?
00115     return false;
00116 }
00117 
00118 uint16 TTEInput::getCTID(EtherFrame *frame)
00119 {
00120     unsigned char macBytes[6];
00121     frame->getDest().getAddressBytes(macBytes);
00122     return (macBytes[4] << 8) | macBytes[5];
00123 }
